content.question: The Crystal Palace, shown above, was built in London in 1851 primarily as

choices.label: private summer residence for the royal family
memorial to those who fought in the Crimean War
celebration of British technological and economic dominance
performance hall for musicals and opera
museum for artifacts from Africa and Asia

content.answer: celebration of British technological and economic dominance

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
